Define Standard Boxes

Set up standard box sizes to make your shipping experience as fast as possible.
You can define any number of box sizes to the right, allowing you to easily load those box dimensions when shipping.

My Boxes

Name Dimensions
Large square box 25 X 30 X 35
Small square box 25 X 30 X 35
Medium square box 10 X 20 X 13
